pÅ™edmÄ›ty: Possible cooperation
obsah:
Hello Mr. Drimalka,

I work at Volkswagen Slowakia in the area of personnel development, and we are currently working on a concept for the qualification of managers in the field of AI. We are looking for someone who is a subject matter expert in the field of AI. However, the consultant should also be taught the practical side.
I met you last year at the management conference in Jasna, so I thought to contact you about this to see if we could possibly start a cooperation in this area as well.
So my question: are you basically open to such concepts? If so, under what conditions?

Here are a few details about the framework conditions for our planned qualification:
- Improvement / digitization / simplification of processes with the help of AI tools
- Drive cross-functional process improvements
- Expanding knowledge of artificial intelligence among the workforce and disseminating topics through best practices
- Initiation to the "open mind" regarding possibilities to create AI
- First and foremost, the target group should be the managers, in order to actually be able to analyze and improve cross-process processes
- After a kick-off, the participants should attend various training courses and conferences to acquire theoretical knowledge
- benchmraks should also be made at other companies in order to be able to get inspiration from practice
- then the participants can develop their own ideas, and they should be supported by the external consultant
- Implementation should also be part of the program
- As a regular scientific forum, these ideas and implementations should also be disseminated within companies by the participant

We would like to work out all other details together in our cooperation.

I would be happy to receive your answer.

Best regards:
Marianna Dreska

Dobry den pani Michalkova,

Tak ako som slubila, zasielam este aj prehlad detailnejsi co by sme potrebovali a prosim ozvite sa mi do konca tyzdna s navrhom terminov od p. Drimalka.

Krok. 1: Workshop: jeden velky pre cca. 30 ludi = 7 x BoM (BoardMembers) + cca. 23 x B1 (Board-1 Management)

Krok. 2: Nasledne debreaf s p.Drimalkom = na urovni BoM max 7 ludi

Ciel: Agentic AI - pochopit ako nam Agentic AI vie pomoct a nahradit nasich ludi. Je to viac zatial len buzzword alebo to uz existuje? Kde sa to kupuje? Ake potrebujeme kompetencie aby sme to vedeli nasadit a pracovat. Co mame robit aby sme efektivne nasadili Agenti AI a v akej oblasti nam odporucaju zacat?

Plus nechame si poradit od Vas - tak ako sme sa rano bavili. Aj nieco inspirativne...

DAkujem a tesim sa na VAsu ponuku.

Dakujem Vam.

Co sa tyka, ci oba eventy mozu byt v jeden den, toto by si podla mna vedeli p. Major a p. Drimalka behom par minut vyjasnit cez telefonat. Ona urcite chcem mat s nim kratky call, aby sa vedeli porozpravat a doriesit. Viete mi prosim navrhnut tento tyzden nejaky slot u p. Drimalku? Kludne dajte prosim aj viac navrhov na termin. Takze to zosumarizujem:
Zajtra poslete prosim cenovu ponuku
Prosim popritom zorganizujem priamy call medzi p. Major a p. Drimalkom, (idealne tento tyzden) aby sa urcite sponzali pred samotnymi workshopmi. Za mna odhad 10-25 min. max.
Nasledne ja potom s Vami doriesim cenovu ponuku a ine zmluvne zalezitosti, co bude potrebne.

Dakujem.

Re: Speaking Opportunity: AI Workshop with PMI.org's Female
 Empowerment Program
obsah:
Dear Josef, Helena, and Filip,
Thank you all very much for the effective communication. On behalf of the PMI CZ team, we are truly grateful for the opportunity to collaborate with you.
I'd like to confirm the date and time for the workshops:
Thursday, September 4th
We will follow the timeline below (CEST):

  *
17:00 â€“ Quick introduction to the workshops (by me)
  *
17:05 â€“ Filipâ€™s presentation
  *
18:00 â€“ Break
  *
18:15 â€“ Josefâ€™s presentation
  *
19:30 â€“ End of the workshops

The PMI CZ Female Empowerment Program is a six-month mentorship initiative for women project managers. Throughout the program, participants engage in group mentorship sessions and attend four workshops on topics they select themselves. Three workshops were held before the summer break; the final one will take place in September. Based on participant feedback, the closing workshop will focus on AI & Future Tech Trends.
We currently have 23 active participants and approximately 10 organizers who may also attend, making the expected audience size up to 30 people. The final number will be confirmed closer to the workshop date, after invitations are sent and RSVPs are received.
While the overall theme will be AI & Future Tech Trends, the exact content of the sessions is fully up to Filip and Josef. We completely trust the direction you will choose to take. As organizers, we would only like to suggest a general structure and flow for the workshops.
As Josef mentioned in his email, the first session could serve as an introductory presentation on AI â€” delivered in a clear, inspiring, and practical way. If Filip could touch on current trends, future expectations, and their relevance to project managers, it would be highly appreciated.
The second session, led by Josef, would follow with a hands-on, practical workshop. Participants would be guided through a case study and shown how to apply AI tools in real time. This format aims to offer a tangible experience in solving project-rel

pÅ™edmÄ›ty: Re: Event May 13th in Bergamo
obsah:
Dear Irene,

Thank you for reaching out to us regarding the HR community event at ABB in
Bergamo on May 13th. We would definitely be interested in discussing a
potential speech or workshop opportunity for your global HR community.

We can offer an inspirational kick-off speech (30-120 minutes) for your
event. Our fee for this type of presentation is 5,500 EUR plus travel
expenses and accommodation.

Please let me ask a few questions:

   1. What time slot would you prefer for the speech?
   2. Approximately how many participants would attend?
   3. Are there any specific outcomes or takeaways you'd like your
   participants to gain?

Meanwhile, I'm reserving May 13th in Filip's calendar, and we'll be happy
to send you a more detailed proposal once we have more information.

Looking forward to your response and the possibility of collaborating with
ABB.

Best regards,

Helena MichÃ¡lkovÃ¡
